channel.title: [Release] Special-PKz v2 [Release]
channel.description:
Special-PKz v2 Source release
This Is A Delta Base
If This Source is posted some were else its leached coz, im only going to post it on here
Some Fetures I Have Added
Im not releasing my client for this.
Added the codes to make blurrs client work on my source Added like 6 portals Added new interface fixed armadly armour used to geo in wrong slots Added 1 more wave on to jad to make a bit harder Added gfxs Added New training Area Created a new home never before seen Fixed the santa armour used to be glitched Added quest skillcape Created A Closed of pk zone Created a skillz Area Added new ::players interface Fixed dfs Spec att Added real rc With abyss Added Thieiving At home Added mining at home Added All Altars etc at home Added bank booths at home Added lots of new shops Removed the anti leach of delta base Fixed the minigame teleports it used to be blank, added godwars tele there Created a new interface at Fight Pits Fixed tribal top no glitches Added all new teleports Added Mith dragon at a new area Added king black dragon Added giant mole Added Moss giants area Added Sara sword Spec 100% Removed alot of arrays Cleaned up the Client.java Deleted all removedobjects So now you can remove wat u want Deleted sum unesary Files Very Stable Source hold up to 230+ No Lagg Added 1 v 1 pking area
Theres Lots More Stuff Just Cant Remember Lols
Server Download Link
Adding Picz later this is just Special-PKz v2 realse but my skillersdream acc got hacked so ill be back on Special Pk Acc Thanks Guyz
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?djm1adjzjmn

item.title: [Release] Special-PKz v2 [Release]
item.dc:creator: @Special_Pkz Special Pkz
item.description:
@Special_Pkz wrote:

Special-PKz v2 Source release

This Is A Delta Base

If This Source is posted some were else its leached coz,
im only going to post it on here

Some Fetures I Have Added

Im not releasing my client for this.

Added the codes to make blurrs client work on my source
Added like 6 portals
Added new interface
fixed armadly armour used to geo in wrong slots
Added 1 more wave on to jad to make a bit harder
Added gfxs
Added New training Area
Created a new home never before seen
Fixed the santa armour used to be glitched
Added quest skillcape
Created A Closed of pk zone
Created a skillz Area
Added new ::players interface
Fixed dfs Spec att
Added real rc With abyss
Added Thieiving At home
Added mining at home
Added All Altars etc at home
Added bank booths at home
Added lots of new shops
Removed the anti leach of delta base
Fixed the minigame teleports it used to be blank, added godwars tele there
Created a new interface at Fight Pits
Fixed tribal top no glitches
Added all new teleports
Added Mith dragon at a new area
Added king black dragon
Added giant mole
Added Moss giants area
Added Sara sword Spec 100%
Removed alot of arrays
Cleaned up the Client.java
Deleted all removedobjects So now you can remove wat u want
Deleted sum unesary Files
Very Stable Source hold up to 230+ No Lagg
Added 1 v 1 pking area

Theres Lots More Stuff Just Cant Remember Lols
